ADD_LIBRARY (llvm_jit INTERFACE)

TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES (llvm_jit INTERFACE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include")
TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES (llvm_jit INTERFACE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/llvm-c")

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (llvm_jit INTERFACE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/LLVMCore.lib")
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (llvm_jit INTERFACE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/LLVMExecutionEngine.lib")
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (llvm_jit INTERFACE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/LLVMOrcJIT.lib")
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (llvm_jit INTERFACE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/LLVMSupport.lib")
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (llvm_jit INTERFACE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/LLVMTarget.lib")
